about_the_game:
Expand the Invincible universe in Funko Fusion with the Invincible Pack. This pack includes:

  • Atom Eve - Playable character

  • Atom Eve - Alternate Eve Outfit

  • Rex Splode - Playable character

  • Invincible - Blue Suit Outfit

  • Omni-Man - Viltrumite Skin
detailed_description:
Expand the Invincible universe in Funko Fusion with the Invincible Pack. This pack includes:

  • Atom Eve - Playable character

  • Atom Eve - Alternate Eve Outfit

  • Rex Splode - Playable character

  • Invincible - Blue Suit Outfit

  • Omni-Man - Viltrumite Skin

name: Funko Fusion - Invincible Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Graphics: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Expand the Invincible universe in Funko Fusion with the Invincible Pack.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil
